feed.title: Ian S. Howell
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Contrastive Explanation
entry.summary: This post provides a brief description of contrastive questions and explanations. It further delves into properties of good contrastive explanations as proposed in the survey by Verma et al. [2020]. What is contrastive explanation? If I were to ask you why the image below is of a five, what would you say? How would you explain why this image contains a five? One way to explain why it is a ...
